tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group

Class ControllerGroup<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group.ControllerGroup<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlListener, ControllerInterface<T>, SkatoloConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlGroup, Tab, Textarea

    public abstract class ControllerGroup<T>
extends Object
implements ControllerInterface<T>, SkatoloConstants, ControlListener
    ControllerGroup is an abstract class and is extended by class ControlGroup, Tab, or the ListBox.

      • controlEvent

        public void controlEvent(ControlEvent theEvent)
        Description copied from interface: ControlListener
        controlEvent is called by skatolo's ControlBroadcaster to inform available listeners about value changes. Use the CallbackListener to get informed when actions such as pressed, release, drag, etc are performed.
        Specified by:
        controlEvent in interface ControlListener
        Parameters:
        theEvent - ControlEvent
        See Also:
        skatolo.CallbackListener, skatolo.CallbackEvent
